description:
Located in South Bend, Indiana, The Law Offices of Chet Zawalich offers unmatched advocacy and support to individuals and families across the region who have suffered serious injuries or lost loved ones due to others' negligence or wrongdoings. Widely recognized as among the leading trial advocates in the country, attorney Chet Zawalich established his law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of representation possible to those who are dealing with complex, pressing legal challenges arising from any of the following areas:

  • Auto accidents
  • Slip-and-falls
  • Medical malpractice
  • Wrongful death
  • Other preventable tragedies

Known for his compassion and integrity, Mr. Zawalich will sit with you and fully discuss your options to help you make the best-informed decisions. You can rely on him to fight hard to protect your rights, preserve your entitlements and increase your chances of recovering the maximum amount of compensation you deserve.

To date, Mr. Zawalich has secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for his plaintiff injury clients, and he has received many top rankings and endorsements from his peers along with numerous testimonials and referrals from his satisfied clients.

To begin the process of achieving justice in the wake of an avoidable mishap that has left you or a beloved family member seriously injured or worse, you can contact The Law Offices of Chet Zawalich to take advantage of the law firm's free initial consultation. The firm also offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.
